metadata.description: Prompt set for empirical validation of the Mode Averaging Principle (MAP/SLOP)
metadata.paper: Statistical Monoculture: How Text-to-Image AI Flattens Cultural and Aesthetic Diversity

categories.cultural_identity: Tests prior transmission and minority mode suppression (Theorem 3.2, Prediction 5)
categories.open_ended: Tests mode averaging / convergence to dominant aesthetic (Theorem 3.2, Corollary 3.7)
categories.artistic_style: Tests cross-mode averaging across art traditions (Proposition 3.4)

prompts.prompt: A photograph of an American woman
prompts.notes: High representation in web-scraped training data

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a British woman
prompts.notes: High representation in web-scraped training data

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a French woman
prompts.notes: High representation in web-scraped training data

prompts.prompt: A photograph of an Australian woman
prompts.notes: High representation in web-scraped training data

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a Canadian woman
prompts.notes: High representation in web-scraped training data

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a Bangladeshi woman
prompts.notes: Paper's motivating example (Figure 1). Low representation; expect wedding/ceremonial bias

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a Nigerian woman
prompts.notes: Sub-Saharan Africa underrepresented in training data

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a Peruvian woman
prompts.notes: Latin American indigenous representation typically low

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a Mongolian woman
prompts.notes: Central Asian representation very low in web-scraped data

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a Maori woman
prompts.notes: Indigenous Oceanian; expect stereotypical cultural markers

prompts.prompt: A photograph of an Ethiopian woman
prompts.notes: East African; diverse cultural traditions but low web representation

prompts.prompt: A photograph of an Uzbek woman
prompts.notes: Central Asian; very low web representation

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a Guatemalan woman
prompts.notes: Central American indigenous; expect traditional clothing bias

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a Samoan woman
prompts.notes: Pacific Islander; very low web representation

prompts.prompt: A photograph of a Kurdish woman
prompts.notes: Stateless ethnic group; representation likely conflated with conflict imagery

prompts.prompt: A beautiful landscape
prompts.notes: Vague aesthetic prompt; expect convergence to dominant Western landscape ideal

prompts.prompt: An ideal home
prompts.notes: Tests cultural default for 'ideal'; expect Western suburban/modern interior

prompts.prompt: A professional person
prompts.notes: Tests demographic defaults; expect Western, male, business attire

prompts.prompt: A happy family
prompts.notes: Tests nuclear family / demographic defaults

prompts.prompt: A delicious meal
prompts.notes: Tests culinary defaults; expect Western/Instagram-style food photography

prompts.prompt: A cozy room
prompts.notes: Tests interior design defaults; expect Scandinavian/Western hygge aesthetic

prompts.prompt: A stylish outfit
prompts.notes: Tests fashion defaults; expect Western fashion norms

prompts.prompt: A futuristic city
prompts.notes: Tests sci-fi aesthetic convergence

prompts.prompt: A romantic scene
prompts.notes: Tests romantic aesthetic defaults

prompts.prompt: A peaceful place
prompts.notes: Tests tranquility aesthetic defaults

prompts.prompt: A painting of a forest in Impressionist style
prompts.notes: Dominant Western art tradition; high training representation

prompts.prompt: A painting of a forest in Ukiyo-e style
prompts.notes: Japanese woodblock; recognisable but non-Western tradition

prompts.prompt: A painting of a forest in Aboriginal dot painting style
prompts.notes: Indigenous Australian; very low training representation

prompts.prompt: A painting of a forest in Persian miniature style
prompts.notes: Islamic/Persian art tradition; low web representation

prompts.prompt: A painting of a forest in Cubist style
prompts.notes: Western modernist; high training representation
